function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Different definitions of recovery in different states may lead to inconsistent reporting of recovered cases","Impact":"Inaccurate reporting of recovered cases may affect public perception and response to the pandemic","Mitigation":"Standardize the definition of recovery across all states to ensure consistency in reporting","Technologies":"Data management and reporting systems to track and monitor recovery cases","People":"Public health officials, government agencies, and data analysts","Owner":"Government agencies, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Uneven and incomplete data entries across different states may lead to inaccurate analysis and interpretation of COVID-19 trends","Impact":"Misleading understanding of the pandemic situation in different states and regions","Mitigation":"Implement consistent data collection and reporting protocols across all states","Technologies":"Data imputation algorithms, data quality validation tools","People":"Data analysts, public health officials, and government agencies","Owner":"Data management and analysis teams"},{"Description":"Variation in testing and positivity rates across states may lead to inconsistent assessment of the pandemic situation","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of the pandemic situation may result in misinformed decision-making and resource allocation","Mitigation":"Standardize testing and positivity rate thresholds across states for consistent evaluation","Technologies":"Data analytics and visualization tools for monitoring testing and positivity rates","People":"Public health officials, government agencies, and data analysts","Owner":"Government agencies, public health organizations"}]}
